product_name: LancomeBi-Facil Double Action Eye Makeup Remover
summary: SummaryLancôme Bi-Facil Double Action Eye Makeup Remover effortlessly removes waterproof makeup. Bi-phase formula contains an oily phase and water phase to remove stubborn makeup without irritation or a greasy feel.
details: DetailsBenefitsShake to activate this simple but effective bi-phase eye makeup remover.From longwear, stubborn eye makeup to waterproof or water-resistant; this oil-based makeup remove removes residue and cleanses the skin.The formula won't leave skin feeling greasy or sticky.Bi-Facil effortlessly removes all eye makeup from waterproof mascaras and eyeliners and dramatic smoky eye looks.This unique Bi-Phase formula is designed with two phases to lift eye makeup off while leaving the skin feeling refreshed and clean.Suitable for all skin types, from normal to sensitive skin, combination to dry skin or oily skin - it's also great for contact lens wearers.Key IngredientsLIPID CONCENTRATE: Instantly removes waterproof makeupEMOLIENTS MIX: Leaves skin clean & freshItem 2235588How To UseBefore each use, shake the bottle to activate the formula and mix the oil phase with the water & phase.Saturate a cotton round or cotton ball with Bi-Facil and hold over closed eyes to moisten and soften all layers of eye makeup including eyeshadow, eyeliner and mascara.Then, gently swipe over makeup to remove. Repeat until all eye makeup is removed.PRO TIP: Saturate or dab Bi-Facil onto a cotton swab or makeup corrector brush to fix makeup application mistakes when applying eye makeup for a flawless finish.IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Cyclopentasiloxane, Isohexadecane, Sodium Chloride, Poloxamer 184, Hexylene Glycol, Dipotassium Phosphate, Benzyl Alcohol, Potassium Phosphate, Quaternium-15, Benzalkonium Chloride, Parfum / Fragrance, Citronellol, Geraniol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Before each use, shake the bottle to activate the formula and mix the oil phase with the water & phase.Saturate a cotton round or cotton ball with Bi-Facil and hold over closed eyes to moisten and soften all layers of eye makeup including eyeshadow, eyeliner and mascara.Then, gently swipe over makeup to remove. Repeat until all eye makeup is removed.PRO TIP: Saturate or dab Bi-Facil onto a cotton swab or makeup corrector brush to fix makeup application mistakes when applying eye makeup for a flawless finish.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again!
reviews.comments: The only eye makeup remover I will ever use. I have tried other name brands but this is the best. It leaves no oily residue ,is gentle but removes mascara completely.

reviews.headline: The GOAT
reviews.comments: This is hands down the best eye make up remover of all time.

reviews.headline: I buy this all the time.
reviews.comments: I love Lancôme products!  It gets my mascara off my eyelashes  in a timely manner!

reviews.headline: I will keep buying  this product for years to come
reviews.comments: I love this eye makeup remover I have been using it for many years gentle on the eyes

reviews.headline: returning this product
reviews.comments: I am returning this product because it is different than the last time I bought it. It did not remove my eye make up, which was not even waterproof. They must've changed the  the formula it doesn't work. I am disappointed because that was my favorite I make up remover

reviews.headline: Works great!
reviews.comments: I love this, it works great and smells really good

reviews.headline: Makeup remover
reviews.comments: Consistently excellent product.  Miss the travel size.

reviews.headline: Lancome Makeup Remover is so worth it
reviews.comments: I have been enjoying this product for years and continue searching it out. Easy to use and easy on the face, eye and all makeup comes off easily, even the water proof liners!

reviews.headline: Best eye makeup remover
reviews.comments: I have tried so many and this is worth the price a it does a fantastic job.

reviews.headline: It's the only eye makeup that really works!
reviews.comments: Works beautifully yet is gentle on your lashes.

reviews.headline: Simply the best eye makeup remover
reviews.comments: I've used this product for decades now to gently remove any eye makeup.  It is the best as I've had to try others when this might not be in stock or I was traveling and forgot to bring some along.

reviews.headline: Best Waterproof Eve Makeup Remover
reviews.comments: I've tried so many different eye makeup removers. When I have tried other products, I take my eye makeup off at night after taking my contacts out, and I still feel a film in my eyes the next morning when putting my contacts back in. This is the best eye makeup remover because it definitely doesn't do that. It doesn't bother my contacts one bit. I don't want to waste time buying anything else in the future.

reviews.headline: Purchased again + again
reviews.comments: Only remover that takes all eye makeup off, including waterproof mascara.  Also use to remove permanent lipsticks.  Using for years.

reviews.headline: Best eye makeup remover
reviews.comments: I think this is the best eye makeup remover made.  I have travel size also and use everyday.

reviews.headline: Makeup remover
reviews.comments: Best product on the market!

reviews.headline: Best ever
reviews.comments: This is the best eyemakeup remover i have ever used, and i have tried many.

reviews.headline: My go to
reviews.comments: I have been using this product for nearly 40 years it's the best for my sensitive eyes

reviews.headline: Too pricey
reviews.comments: I love it but its over priced

reviews.headline: Overpriced and Overhyped
reviews.comments:
Just bought it for the first time and not sure its better than Neutrogena which I've never been a fan of but it sure is a lot less expensive than Lancome. 
I would not buy again because of the price and lack of quality.

reviews.headline: Perfect for sensitive eye area
reviews.comments: Only product for makeup eye removal  use

media.headline: A terrific eye make up remover
I buy this product for makeup remover and I love it.

faceoff_positive.comments: I use this product to remove my eye makeup. I noticed with the pads they sell to remove eye makeup. Are causing me wrinkles by my eye area. But this product is so awesome I just use it on a cotton ball and just wipes off without pulling the skin. Love it love it
faceoff_positive.headline: I'm going to buy it again and again and again. I love it

faceoff_negative.comments: I loved this product and used for a number of years. However, the last few bottles have been less effective at removing makeup and I find I use numerous cotton balls soaked to get eye shadow, mascara, etc removed.  I think they have watered down the formula to the point I may look for a new brand of makeup remover
